blitzEdit.core

Class Connector

  • java.lang.Object
    • blitzEdit.core.Element
      • blitzEdit.core.Connector

  • public final class Connector
extends Element
    Specifies a point which is connecting Components with each other by lines
    Author:
    David Schick, Christian Gärtner
